"Buddha Chay Nice relaxing atmosphere and a great selection of both mock-meat and whole food dishes (vegetable, tofu, etc). I ordered the lotus stem salad, eggplant braised with silken tofu, offals braised with fermented cabbage (phá l?u kho c?i chua), and seaweed soup. All of them were absolutely delicious, especially the eggplant dish! Next time, I'd be interested to try the braised jackfruit. Service was fine, although it takes a little work if you sit in the second floor room like I did; servers tended to forget we were in there as the room was closed off. Overall, a satisfactory and recommended experience."

"Buddha Chay Image of vegetarian food changed completely after coming from Japan to Vietnam. Here in VN, vegetarian dishes are more like everyday meal. And rather rich in oil to satisfy apetite.
